title: A Dog's Journey: The Tale of Max
prompt: Make a story on a dog
preview: A Dog's Journey: The Tale of Max The Lost Puppy In a quiet forest on the edge of a small town, a tiny puppy named Max was born to a pack of stray dogs. He was small, with soft fur and wide, curious eyes. One day, while exploring, Max wandered too far from his siblings and got lost. His cries echoed ...
